meta.title: Dr. Alex Dummett | Healthcare AI Consultant
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing healthcare AI consulting, clinical informatics, and patient safety expertise

about.bio: Dr. Alex Dummett is an award-winning and nationally recognized physician-informaticist whose career bridges clinical practice, medical education, patient safety, and the integration of artificial intelligence into healthcare. He is board-certified in Internal Medicine and in Clinical Informatics by the American Board of Preventive Medicine. With over a decade of experience, he has built and optimized AI-powered clinical decision support tools that improve outcomes and support high-stakes decision-making.
focus: Healthcare Quality, Safety & Early Warning Systems

experience.title: Consultant â€“ AI & Healthcare Innovation
experience.description: After over a decade of leading quality improvement initiatives, deploying predictive analytics, and transforming clinical workflows, I've launched the next chapter of my career as a Healthcare AI and Clinical Informatics Consultant. I partner with startups, health systems, hospitals, medical groups, residency programs, and medical schools to drive responsible AI integration, improve diagnostic accuracy, and prepare the clinical workforce for an AI-enabled future.
achievements: Advising on AI model validation, regulatory compliance, and clinical adoption
Enhancing physician decision-making, reducing diagnostic errors, and improving patient outcomes
Integrating AI-driven workflows into Epic and other EHRs to improve efficiency
Developing AI-powered OSCEs, diagnostic reasoning tools, and simulation-based training

experience.title: Physician Advisor, FORMD
experience.description: Supporting innovation at the intersection of AI, healthcare, and medical education. My work involves designing, evaluating, and scaling high-impact clinical tools that enhance safety, clinical reasoning, and educational outcomes.
achievements: Advising on clinical use cases and ensuring product safety in AI-driven tools
Integrating quality improvement and informatics frameworks into solution design
Supporting evidence-based decision-making through simulation and training platforms

experience.title: Faculty â€“ Institute for Healthcare Improvement (IHI)
experience.description: Serve as faculty at the Institute for Healthcare Improvement, teaching AI use cases for Quality Improvement. Panelist expert at the 2024 IHI & NYU Hackathon. For two years, have served on the committee to select the AI for QI track for the IHI Forum 2024 and upcoming IHI Forum 2025.
achievements: Taught AI use cases for Quality Improvement to healthcare professionals
Panelist expert at the 2024 IHI & NYU Hackathon
Served on the committee to select AI for QI track for IHI Forum 2024 and 2025

experience.title: Associate Program Director, Internal Medicine Residency & Patient Safety Officer
experience.description: Led the creation and execution of an Internal Medicine Residency program, mentored faculty and residents, and implemented quality improvement and patient safety initiatives, including serving as the National Early Warning System Subject Matter Expert.
achievements: Created and executed Internal Medicine Residency program
Mentored faculty and residents in clinical practice
Implemented quality improvement and patient safety initiatives
Served as National Early Warning System Subject Matter Expert

experience.title: Interim Scientific Chair â€“ Scientific Session 2025: Evidence-Based AI in Medicine
experience.company: American College of Artificial Intelligence and Medicine
experience.description: Served as Interim Scientific Chair for the conference hosted by the American College of Artificial Intelligence and Medicine 2025. This event gathered clinicians, researchers, educators, technologists, and policy leaders to advance responsible AI in healthcare.
achievements: Curated a program rooted in evidence, clinical relevance, and meaningful impact
Fostered honest dialogue and community-building in healthcare AI
Brought together experts from across the healthcare AI ecosystem

experience.title: Advance Alert Monitor Regional Clinical Lead
experience.description: Led the pilot, development, and expansion of the award-winning Advance Alert Monitor, reducing in-hospital deterioration across multiple hospitals and managing extensive EPIC Clinical Decision Support tools.
achievements: Led development of award-winning Advance Alert Monitor system
Reduced in-hospital deterioration across multiple hospitals
Managed extensive EPIC Clinical Decision Support tools
Implemented AI-powered early warning systems

experience.title: Advisor & Consultant â€“ GME, UME, CME, QI, PS, Simulation, Clinical Informatics (AI focus)
experience.description: Serve as advisor and consultant for PYA, providing expertise in Graduate Medical Education (GME), Undergraduate Medical Education (UME), Continuing Medical Education (CME), Quality Improvement (QI), Patient Safety (PS), simulation, and clinical informatics with a focus on Artificial Intelligence integration in healthcare.
achievements: Advising on GME, UME, CME program development and optimization
Guiding quality improvement and patient safety initiatives
Implementing simulation-based education and training
Consulting on clinical informatics and AI integration in healthcare settings

experience.title: Telemedicine Primary Care Doctor
experience.description: Providing comprehensive remote patient care, including diagnosis, treatment, and management of chronic conditions through telehealth platforms. Utilizing AI-powered decision support tools and remote monitoring technologies to enhance patient engagement and care outcomes. Collaborating with interdisciplinary teams to optimize virtual care workflows, ensure evidence-based practices, and improve access to primary care services.
achievements: Delivered virtual primary care and chronic disease management to diverse patient populations
Leveraged AI-powered decision support and remote monitoring for improved outcomes
Optimized telemedicine workflows and access to care through interdisciplinary collaboration

experience.title: Founder Advisor and Clinical Informatics Consultant
experience.description: Conducted assessments of healthcare technology systems and processes, identifying areas for improvement and recommending solutions. Provided technical and clinical expertise in healthcare data analysis, clinical informatics, and process improvement. Collaborated with Health Fidelity during its startup phase, contributing to its growth and technological advancements.
achievements: Advised on clinical informatics and analytics for healthcare technology startup
Contributed to product development and process improvement initiatives
Supported company growth through technical and clinical expertise

experience.title: Pool Hospitalist
experience.description: Rounded, admitted, and discharged patients with a daily census of 18-25 patients at a community hospital. Provided comprehensive inpatient care and collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to ensure high-quality outcomes.
achievements: Managed high-volume inpatient census with consistent quality care
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams for optimal patient outcomes

experience.title: Pool Physician
experience.description: Served as Pool Physician providing comprehensive patient care across various departments and clinical settings. Maintained clinical responsibilities while serving in leadership roles within the residency program.
achievements: Provided comprehensive patient care across multiple clinical departments
Maintained high-quality clinical outcomes in diverse healthcare settings
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams for optimal patient care
